attributes.action: Increase the total time allowed for the  GCSE English Language paper 1 & 2
attributes.background: Students have been finding it difficult to complete all eight questions within the time allowed to their best standard. Increasing the time to complete the paper will provide better results and will not have an impact on our country's education system.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Exam time limits are the responsibility of exam boards.
